title: TikTok takes a cue from YouTube with ad revenue sharing model to support creators
content:
TikTok is starting a new program called ‘TikTok Pulse‘ to share its ad revenue with creators. TikTok Pulse will work with top creators by allowing ads to appear next to “the top 4% of all videos” on the platform.

more…

The post TikTok takes a cue from YouTube with ad revenue sharing model to support creators appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: TikTok Pulse will work with top creators by allowing ads to appear next to “the top 4% of all videos on TikTok”.
